item.description:
This will be our second meetup.
We have literature for handouts, some constitutions (we need a bunch more), and the book giveaway starts this Tuesday with 'A Foreign Policy of Freedom' by Ron Paul.

We will be discussing the parade on July 4th in Merrimack.

Before the meeting, there will be a few hard-core Ron Paul supporters waving signs at the intersection of DW Highway and Spit Brook Road (Barnes and Noble) - see calendar.

Go Ron Paul!

Rich
item.name: The Nashua Ron Paul 2008 July 3 Meetup
